faqs.q: What are some drinks that are high in calories?
faqs.a: Examples include milkshakes (400+ kcal per 12 oz), sweetened coffee drinks (300+ kcal), and creamy smoothies (350+ kcal).

faqs.q: Why are milkshakes drinks that are high in calories?

faqs.q: How many calories in a high-calorie soda?
faqs.a: A 20 oz regular soda has about 250 kcal, less than shakes but still notable from sugars.

faqs.q: Are alcoholic drinks high in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, cocktails like margaritas (200-300 kcal per serving) or creamy liqueurs add calories from alcohol and mixers.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in high-calorie drinks?
faqs.a: Opt for smaller sizes, low-fat milk, or sugar-free versions to cut 100-200 kcal per serving.
